amendatorysection.para: Any member may administer oaths in the Legislature, and while acting on a committee may administer oaths on the business of such committee.

annotation.para: Although this section provides that any member of the Legislature "May administer oaths in the Legislature, and while acting on a committee may administer oaths on the business of such committee" no Nebraska statute requires that an oath be administered to individuals testifying before a legislative committee. State v. Douglas, 222 Neb. 833, 388 N.W.2d 801 (1986).
